content: giant granny square afghan materials yarn any yarn will work i used medium/dk weight for my example blanket crochet hook any hook will work i used a i hook for my example blanket 5 5 mm scissors stitch markers notes i fasten_off each row to change colors video tutorial here and step by step photo tutorial here to keep your square straight flip your work each row chain 3 always counts above row 1 make circle 2 double_crochet into center of circle chain 2 *3 double_crochet into circle chain 2 repeat from * 2 more times slip_stitch into first double_crochet stitch made in this row row 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet into the same space as chain 3 just made chain 1 *3 double_crochet in corner space chain 2 3 double_crochet into same space chain 1 repeat from * around the square slip_stitch into first chain 3 made in this row row 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet into top right corner space *chain 1 3dc into next open space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet into open corner space repeat from * around square slip_stitch into first chain 3 made in this row this will be the same pattern throughout in each open space on any side you will do 3 double_crochet in-between any 3 double_crochet on the sides you will chain 1 in each corner space you will make 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet into the same corner space continue this pattern for each new row until
